summary: The customer was not happy with the streaming product they purchased from Contoso Wireless due to buffering and poor video quality issues. After looking into the issue, the customer service agent determined that the issue was likely related to the customer's internet connection or router settings. The customer service agent offered a one-time discount on a future purchase from Contoso Wireless as a way of apologizing for any inconvenience this may have caused. The customer accepted the offer and thanked the agent for their help.
